message.name: AA241X_MISSION_STATUS
message.description: Message containing the current mission information for the Spring 2015 AA241x mission
message.field: Whether or not mission is allowed to start: 0 = violation, 1 = start allowed
Mission state: 0 = not in mission, 1 = in mission

message.name: AA241X_WATER_DROP
message.description: Location and misssion timestamp that water was virtually dropped from the UAV
message.field: Mission time in microseconds at which the water was dropped

message.name: AA241X_NEW_FIRE_1
message.description: Location and mission timestamp for new fire cells. There are 3 separate messages to handle a large number of (i,j) coords safely
message.field: Mission time in microseconds at which these new fire cells were created
list of i coords of new fire (i = 255 means unused array element)
list of j coords of new fire (j = 255 means unused array element)

message.name: AA241X_NEW_FIRE_2
message.field: Mission time in microseconds at which these new fire cells were created
list of i coords of new fire (i = 255 means unused array element)
list of j coords of new fire (j = 255 means unused array element)
